label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_018
content:
## 2026-01-19 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster/usage: REQUESTS 12000 req | p50: 45ms p95: 120ms p99: 250ms | err: 0.2% (24 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node/utilization: REQUESTS 9500 req | p50: 30ms p95: 80ms p99: 150ms | err: 0.1% (10 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance/status: REQUESTS 3000 req | p50: 20ms p95: 50ms p99: 100ms | err: 0.3% (9 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction/trigger: REQUESTS 8000 req | p50: 25ms p95: 70ms p99: 140ms | err: 0.2% (16 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io/metrics: REQUESTS 15000 req | p50: 35ms p95: 90ms p99: 200ms | err: 0.4% (60 errors) | success: 99.6%
- /storage/metadata/db: REQUESTS 20000 req | p50: 40ms p95: 100ms p99: 220ms | err: 0.1% (20 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/quota/status: REQUESTS 5000 req | p50: 22ms p95: 60ms p99: 130ms | err: 0.2% (10 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/ingest: REQUESTS 7000 req | p50: 28ms p95: 75ms p99: 160ms | err: 0.3% (21 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/reliability/status: REQUESTS 4000 req | p50: 33ms p95: 85ms p99: 180ms | err: 0.2% (8 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/backup/verify: REQUESTS 6000 req | p50: 38ms p95: 95ms p99: 210ms | err: 0.1% (6 errors) | success: 99.9%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-11: CPU 75% | Mem 83% | Disk Used 97% | Conns: 1200 | Net: 7.9/7.2 Mbps
- stor-b-08: CPU 64% | Mem 74% | Disk Used 96% | Conns: 950 | Net: 6.6/6.1 Mbps
- stor-c-17: CPU 60% | Mem 71% | Disk Used 94% | Conns: 880 | Net: 6.0/5.5 Mbps
- meta-02: CPU 68% | Mem 91% | Disk Used 86% | Conns: 650 | Net: 3.5/3.1 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage: active 150 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 200 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-metadata: active 50 | idle 20 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 80 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-rebalance: active 10 | idle 5 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 15ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 89.4% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 15000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] disk_failure on stor-c-17: disk replaced, rebuild completed in 6.5 hours
- [WARNING] quota_hard_blocks on tenants: 3
- [INFO] manifest_backlog reduced from 4.7k to 3.3k
- [INFO] cache hit rate improved to 89.4%
- [INFO] rebalance jobs completed: 12
- [INFO] rebalance jobs started: 10
- [INFO] disk failure on stor-c-17 replaced; rebuild duration: 6.5 hours
- [INFO] quota governance actions reduced hard blocks from 4 to 3; two tenants migrated to EC pool

### Deployments & Changes
- Added extra metadata worker and batching reduced manifest backlog from 4.7k to 3.3k; cache hit improved to 89.4%
- Completed 12 rebalance jobs, cooling hot partitions and improving skew index to 1.06
- Disk failure on stor-c-17 replaced; rebuild completed in 6.5 hours with brief increase in disk busy but no data unavailability
- Quota governance actions reduced hard blocks from 4 to 3; confirmed two tenants completed archival migration to EC pool

### Events
- Added extra metadata worker and batching reduced manifest backlog from 4.7k to 3.3k; cache hit improved to 89.4%
- Completed 12 rebalance jobs, cooling hot partitions and improving skew index to 1.06
- Disk failure on stor-c-17 replaced; rebuild completed in 6.5 hours with brief increase in disk busy but no data unavailability
- Quota governance actions reduced hard blocks from 4 to 3; confirmed two tenants completed archival migration to EC pool

### On-Call
- Shift: Kiran D. 4 pages. 8 tickets. Status: Stable; backlog improved, rebalance effective, and disk replacement completed. Utilization remains high with continued focus on tenant lifecycle policies.
